alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Douglas; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:27PM MDT until August 15 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Western Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Pinery, or 19 miles south of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... The Pinery around 335 PM MDT. Lone Tree around 340 PM MDT. Eastern Centennial and Parker around 345 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include southwestern Aurora, Arapahoe Park and Buckley AFB. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
